answers.answer: Multiple sclerosis and damage to the spinal cord, diabetes and other illnesses can have an effect on urinary urgency, as well as getting older.In most cases no cause can be found.If you are suddenly experiencing urinary urgency, it is wise to see your doctor to check your urine for any infections and to find out the underlying cause.Best wishes.

question: Would cervical spinal cord compression cause loss of compliance of the urinary bladders detrusor muscle?  Does ms affect this muscle?
title: Cord compression and bladder muscle question
